akn:section.akn:heading: Same; jurisdiction of United States over Federal areas unaffected

akn:content.akn:p: § 108. Same; jurisdiction of United States over Federal areas unaffected The provisions of sections 105–110 of this title shall not for the purposes of any other provision of law be deemed to deprive the United States of exclusive jurisdiction over any Federal area over which it would otherwise have exclusive jurisdiction or to limit the jurisdiction of the United States over any Federal area. (July 30, 1947, ch. 389, 61 Stat. 645.)
